headline: Sant' Andrea University Hospital to Integrate GE HealthCare and Tribun Health's Enterprise Imaging and Digital Pathology Solutions to Help Improve Patient Care
summary: GE HealthCare and Tribun Health collaboration helps foster enterprise imaging and pathology for oncology CHICAGO, ILLINOIS / ACCESS Newswire / December 10, 2025 / GE HealthCare (Nasdaq: GEHC) announced today that Sant' Andrea University Hospital, ...
